author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...FERNAND MOVING NORTH-NORTHEAST OVER THE OPEN ATLANTIC WITH LITTLE CHANGE IN STRENGTH...
summary: ...FERNAND MOVING NORTH-NORTHEAST OVER THE OPEN ATLANTIC WITH LITTLE CHANGE IN STRENGTH... As of 5:00 AM AST Mon Aug 25 the center of Fernand was located near 33.7, -58.8 with movement NNE at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1007 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...FERNAND MOVING NORTH-NORTHEAST OVER THE OPEN ATLANTIC WITH LITTLE CHANGE IN STRENGTH... As of 5:00 AM AST Mon Aug 25 the center of Fernand was located near 33.7, -58.8 with movement NNE at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1007 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Fernand (AT1/AL062025)
